entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 10:00 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

Temperature: -15.5°C

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -17.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
